attributes.action: Parliament & HMG must retract Article 50 Letter. Legal basis in treaty is flawed
attributes.additional_details:
In 1975 the People gave their assent to the European COMMUNITY (Customs Union, Single Market) only. The Lisbon Treaty created the European UNION. It is constitutionally quite different.  Both Parties gave a "cast iron promise" to hold a Referendum on EU treaty. They reneged. In 2016 the People voted LEAVE the European UNION. HMG must permit a referendum on Lisbon Treaty BEFORE it can use any article including Article 50. 
Parliament and HMG must pause Article 50 until People assent to Lisbon T.
attributes.background:
Brexit is only valid if People give their assent to EU Treaty containing Article 50. People's referendum only agreed to Customs Union & Single Market, not EU.
Action required by Parliament and Government:
1. Withdraw or suspend Article 50 letter.
2. Hold Referendum on Lisbon Treaty to validate it

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. The Lisbon Treaty came into force in 2009. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking the UK Government and Parliament to pull out of the Lisbon Treaty.
